attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anti-social behaviour is fast escalating out of control. 50% of all crime is committed by a hard core of 100000 persistent offenders who brazenly flout the law and make life miserable for the law abiding majority. They feel they are untouchable and are supported by the human rights brigade, who simply use them to enrich themselves, at public expense. THe time has come for drastic action and, as these serial louts contribute nothing to society and simply act as a drain on resources they should be sent to a camp from which there would be no escape.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
